articles.title: Ri Su Yong Greets FM of Guatemala
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Greets FM of Guatemala
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on Oct. 8 sent a message of greeting to Carlos Raul Morales Moscoso upon his appointment as foreign minister of the Republic of Guatemala.
					 The message wished him success in his new job, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Greets FM of Sweden
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Greets FM of Sweden
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on Oct. 13 sent a message of greeting to Margot Elisabeth Wallstrom upon her appointment as foreign minister of the Kingdom of Sweden.
					 The message expressed belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would grow stronger in various fields in the common interests.

articles.title: Gift from Nepalese Party Leader
articles.content:
Gift from Nepalese Party Leader
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the chairman of the Central Committee of the Nepal Worker-Peasant Party.
					 The gift was handed over to an official concerned on Wednesday by Administrator of Baktapur City of Nepal Ram Mani Bhattarai who is heading the friendship delegation of the city on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Gift from Nepalese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift from Nepalese Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the visiting friendship delegation of Baktapur City of Nepal.
					 The gift was handed over to an official concerned by head of the delegation Ram Mani Bhattarai, administrator of the city, on Wednesday.

articles.title: World Gymnastic Gold Medalists of DPRK Back Home
articles.content:
World Gymnastic Gold Medalists of DPRK Back Home
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK players Hong Un Jong and Ri Se Gwang who proved successful in the 45th Artistic Gymnastics World Championships returned home on Wednesday.
					 Hong and Ri came first respectively in women's and men's vault at the championships which was held in China from Oct. 3 to 12
					
					 They were greeted by Kim Phyong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Yong Hun, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, officials concerned and their families at Pyongyang Railway Station.
					
					 Sportspersons put garlands around their necks and presented bouquets to them.
					
					 The players and coaches visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid floral tribute to them.

articles.title: DPRK Gold Medalists Feted
articles.content:
DPRK Gold Medalists Feted 
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Cabinet gave a reception at Okryu Restaurant on Wednesday for Hong Un Jong and Ri Se Gwang, gold medalists at the 45th Artistic Gymnastics World Championships. 
					 Present at the reception were Kim Phyong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Yong Hun, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, officials concerned, players, coaches and families.
					
					 Kim Yong Jin said that Hong and Ri's successes at the world championships were ascribable to the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is energetically steering the development of sports with a firm determination and will to build a sports powerhouse of Juche on this land, true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He called on all the sportspersons to fully prepare themselves politically and  ideologically, physically and in technique, always bearing in mind the party's trust and expectation,  and thus grab more gold medals in international games.
					
					 Hong in her reply speech renewed her resolution to undergo intensive training, always bearing in mind the party's loving care and trust in the sportspersons, and thus fly flags of the Republic at international games and demonstrate the spirit of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Friendship Meeting with Friendship Delegation of Baktapur City of Nepal Held
articles.content:
Friendship Meeting with Friendship Delegation of Baktapur City of Nepal Held
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- A friendship meeting with members of the friendship delegation of Baktapur City of Nepal was held at Kim Jong Suk Secondary School No. 1 on Wednesday.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the delegation headed by Ram Mani Bhattarai, administrator of the city.
					
					 An Myong Ok, chairwoman of the Phyongsong City People's Committee, members of the DPRK-Nepal Friendship Association, officials concerned and teachers and students of the school were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The participants enjoyed an art performance given by students and talked to one another, deepening the friendship.

articles.title: Russian Guests Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Russian Guests Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Maritime Territorial branch of the United Russia Party led by Lyudmila Talabaeva, secretary of the Regional Political Council, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and patriotic life of his family members, the guests went round the historical relics preserved with good care at the old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					 The head of the delegation praised the President as the greatest man who devoted his all to the freedom and liberation of the people all his life.
					
					 The delegation toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, the Museum of Weapons and Equipment of the Korean People's Army, the Munsu Water Park, etc.

articles.title: Cuban Embassy Officials Give Helping Hands to Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Cuban Embassy Officials Give Helping Hands to Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK German Hermin Ferras Alvarez and staff members of his embassy Wednesday did friendship labor at the DPRK-Cuba Friendship Hwasong Vegetable Greenhouse Farm.
					 The guests visited the farm associated with leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and helped the farmers in carrying rice-sheaves.
					
					 During break they had conversations with officials of the farm.
					
					 The ambassador expressed hope that the farmers would make innovations in agricultural production under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Scientific Achievements Made in DPRK
articles.content:
Scientific Achievements Made in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK has recently made a lot of scientific achievements conducive to the development of the nation's economy and education.
					 Its Mechanical Engineering Institute developed a new technology of manufacturing piston ring for non-oiling compressor and an electrode-controlled hydraulic device, helpful to the country's chemical industry.
					
					 The Central Mining Research Institute succeeded in considerably raising the capacity of mechanical flotator while the Environmental Engineering Institute made a big progress in researches to decrease the air pollution by CO in sealed areas of collieries and mines.
					
					 Meanwhile the Zoology Research Institute published a multimedia "Pictorial Book of Korean Birds", conducting the work to classify and systematize the animals inhabiting Korea.

articles.title: Global Handwashing Day Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
Global Handwashing Day Observed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Pyongyang and Pongsan County, North Hwanghae Province of the DPRK on Wednesday, Global Handwashing Day. 
					 The theme for this year is "Choose handwashing, choose health".
					
					 In this regard, Kim Chol Man, a department director of the Ministry of Urban Management, told KCNA:
					
					 Hand-washing plays an important role in guaranteeing human health and preventing all sorts of diseases.
					
					 Such diseases as diarrhea and pneumonia, much detected among children, are caused by bacillus in hands.
					
					 That's why everyone, children and women in particular, should make it a rule to frequently wash hands with soap every day.

articles.title: Munsu Water Park One Year Old
articles.content:
Munsu Water Park One Year Old
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- One year has passed since the Munsu Water Park was built on the picturesque bank of the River Taedong.
					 The park has all facilities so that working people and school youth and children can have good rest, regardless of seasons.
					
					 The first place visitors enter after passing the gatepost having the signboard of "Munsu Water Park" is the lobby of the indoor wading pool where they see the colored plaster statue of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The pool was built in a peculiar architectural style as it is roofed with three ball trusses and has a good harmony of its magnificent and exquisite appearance. Therefore, they can enjoy the same swimming even in cold winter as they do at sea.
					
					 The water park has cave-style resting place, 9 saunas with peculiar treatment and welfare service and other facilities to please the visitors.
					
					 There is a gymnasium where they can play volleyball, basketball and badminton and even enjoy rock-climbing and trampoline.
					
					 Over the past one year the water park has drawn more than 880,000 people from all walks of life, school youth and children, overseas compatriots and foreigners.

articles.title: Independence Is What Keeps Countries and Nations Alive: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Independence Is What Keeps Countries and Nations Alive: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Fair and principled international relations are sure to be established when all countries and nations pursue independent foreign policies, regarding independence as their life and soul, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 In order to adhere to independence, a country should work hard with an independent stand and build an independent national economy, the paper says and goes on:
					
					 It presents itself as a very urgent issue to achieve self-support in economy particularly under the situation where the imperialists are keen to perpetrate interference and realize domination through economic infiltration under the deceptive signboard of "aid" and "cooperation".
					
					 Capability for self-defence provides a sure military guarantee for holding fast to independence in politics and self-support in economy.
					
					 If a country has defence capability powerful enough to beat back any formidable enemy, imperialists can never ignite a war of aggression against it. It is the psychology and tendency of the imperialists to flinch before the strong and become more outrageous before the weak.
					
					 This is proved by the tradition of the DPRK in which it has won victories in the all-out confrontation with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 All countries aspiring after independence should unite and not allow the imperialists to perpetrate high-handed and arbitrary practices in the international arena any longer.
					
					 No matter what desperate efforts imperialists may make, they can never arrest the struggle of the broad strata of the working people for independence.

articles.title: Proposal for Founding DFRK Is Most Fair Proposal for Reunification: Korean in Japan
articles.content:
Proposal for Founding DFRK Is Most Fair Proposal for Reunification: Korean in Japan
 Tokyo, October 14 (KNS-KCNA) -- Ri Mun I, vice-chairperson of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, released a statement on Oct. 11 on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK).
					 The proposal for founding the DFRK based on one nation, one state, two systems and two governments is the most fair and realistic proposal for reunification as it is supported and welcomed by anyone who wants reunification, the statement said.
					
					 The validity and vitality of the proposal for reunification through federal formula, which serves as a firm groundwork for building an independent national reunified state, have been fully demonstrated since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, it noted.
					
					 The adoption of the June 15 joint declaration helped make a breakthrough in the barrier of division that has remained frozen for more than half a century, and turn the north-south relations from the relations of mistrust and confrontation into those of reconciliation and unity, it said.
					
					 The brisk movement for national reunification conducted not only in the north and the south but overseas convinced Koreans that if they work hard to meet the interests and aims common to the nation irrespective of differing ideologies and social systems in the north and the south, they can settle any problem and achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity, it noted.
					
					 It called upon the Korean nation to reunify the country, firmly preserving the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, which was agreed upon and solemnly declared by the north and the south at home and abroad.
					
					 It expressed the will to devote efforts and wisdom to strengthening the national unity of the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad and achieving the reunification of the country and co-prosperity of the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in booklet by the Rosiski Pisateli Publishing House of Russia on October 8.
					 This is the speech made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade held to celebrate the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012). It says the 100 year-long history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to exalt the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Show Held in Russia
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Show Held in Russia
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia show was held in Nakhodka City, Russia on October 7 on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present at its opening ceremony were figures of various circles and masses in the city.
					
					 A vice mayor of the city said:
					
					 Kimjongilia is such flower that the longer one sees it, the more beautiful it looks.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited Russia several times to put the Russia-DPRK relations on a new level.
					
					 The people in the maritime territorial region know well him and Kimjongilia.
					
					 A deputy chairman of the city assembly noted:
					
					 I deem it great honor to see the immortal flower bearing the august name of Kim Jong Il in full bloom in Nakhodka City.
					
					 Kimjongilia symbolizes the strong and firm will, noble personality and ardent enthusiasm of the peerless great man.
					
					 Looking back on history, there are only Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia that go by the august names of the great men.
					
					 The chairman of the Nakhodka city branch of the All-Russia Veteran Community Organization said that Kimjongilia is very beautiful and attractive flower, adding: Seeing the immortal flower, I recollected with deep emotion the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for the happiness of the Korean people and the Russia-DPRK friendship. His exploits will always be remembered by all people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Italy
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- An Italian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Rome on October 8.
					 Matteo Carbonelli, secretary general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold a joint seminar of political parties and organizations in the European region, remembrance meeting and other political and cultural events on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: History of WPK Introduced by Foreign Bodies
articles.content:
History of WPK Introduced by Foreign Bodies 
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign bodies posted articles on their websites between Oct. 6 and 8 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 69th anniversary of the foundation of the WPK and the 88th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on its website an article titled "Ever-victorious WPK" illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung standing together with leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Oct. 10, 1945 saw the founding of the WPK which organizes and guides all victories of the Korean people, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The unity and cohesion of the WPK provided by the President were further consolidated by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The party enjoys the people's absolute support and trust.
					
					 The party is called a mother party as it takes care of the destiny of the people in a responsible manner thanks to the President and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The South African Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website articles titled "Down with Imperialism", etc. illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The articles dealt with the glorious history of the WPK and the significance of the formation of the DIU.
					
					 The Anti－Imperialist Front of France posted on its website articles titled "Great feats" and "WPK is a party which inherited the tradition of the DIU".
					
					 The articles praised the President and Kim Jong Il for founding and developing the WPK and dealt with the fact that the WPK emerged victorious, holding high the banner of Songun, the banner of independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- There took place in different countries film shows in celebration of the 17th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 69th anniversary of the foundation of the WPK.
					 Film shows were held by the Party for Socialist Choice of Romania, the Unido Azidharma Industrial Company of Indonesia, the Real Industry Machine Company of Indonesia and companies of Singapore and Angola from Oct. 2 to 7.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" and "Monument to Party Founding".

articles.title: Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Reading sessions, solidarity meetings, seminars and film shows took place in Benin, Nigeria, and Germany from Oct. 6 to 9 on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					 Films shown included Korean film "Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification".
					
					 Reading "3. Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully" of President Kim Il Sung's work "Report to the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee", the chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism who is rector of the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin said as follows:
					
					 The President clarified the proposal, thus elucidating the most correct orientation and way of reunifying Korea.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, true to the President's cause of national reunification, and thus opened up a bright vista for reunification.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un dedicates his all to carrying out the preceding leaders' instructions for national reunification.
					
					 Korea is sure to be a strong and prosperous reunified state thanks to Kim Jong Un, the lodestar of national reunification.
					
					 The chairman of an association of Nigeria in a speech backed the proposal and extended full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle to reunify the country under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said that the proposal is the most just one for the reunification which only the President, a peerless patriot who loved the country and nation, can put forward.
					
					 Korea should be reunified in the spirit of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the former, he added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by German Political Party on Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by German Political Party on Website
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" was posted by the Communist Party of Germany on its website in celebration of the 69th anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The work, published on Oct. 3, Juche 79 (1990), deals with the idea that the leadership of the party serves as a decisive guarantee for the victory of socialist cause, the issue of developing the WPK into a Juche-type revolutionary party, the basic ways of fulfilling the mission and duty of the party as a leading political organization.
					
					 The portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il was also posted on the website.

articles.title: Regresan a Pyongyang Hong Un Jong y Ri Se Gwang
articles.content:
Regresan a Pyongyang Hong Un Jong y Ri Se Gwang
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- Regresaron el dia 15 a esta capital los jugadores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Hong Un Jong y Ri Se Gwang, que ganaron medallas de oro en el 45o Campeonato Mundial de Gimnasia de Aparatos.
					En esta cita deportiva efectuada del dia 3 al 12 en China, Hong ocupo el primer lugar en el potro femenino y Ri, en masculino.
					
					En la estacion de Pyongyang, les acogieron el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Phyong Hae, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, el ministro de Deportes Kim Yong Hun, los funcionarios, los familiares y jugadores.
					
					Los deportistas les ofrecieron los collares y ramos de flores.
					
					Los deportistas y entrenadores rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras depositar los ramos de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce erguidas en la capitalina colina Mansu.

articles.title: Consejo de Ministros ofrece banquete en honor de gimnastas ganadores
articles.content:
Consejo de Ministros ofrece banquete en honor de gimnastas ganadores
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio el dia 15 en el Restaurante Okryu un banquete en honor de los gimnastas coreanos Hong Un Jong y Ri Se Gwang quienes ganaron las medallas de oro en el 45o Campeonato Mundial de Gimnasia de Aparatos.
					A la recepcion asistieron el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Phyong Hae, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, el ministro de Deportes Kim Yong Hun y otros funcionarios interesados, los deportistas, los entrenadores y los familiares de vencedores.
					
					En su discurso, el vicepremier dijo que la victoria de los gimnastas coreanos en el presente campeonato se debe a la destacada direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien en acato al legado de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, dirige con dinamismo las labores deportivas del pais con la firme decision y voluntad de construir en esta tierra una potencia deportiva.
					
					Subrayo que todos los deportistas deben prepararse en lo ideologico-politico y en lo fisico-tecnico teniendo presente la confianza y esperanza del partido para conquistar mas medallas de oro en los juegos internacionales.
					
					En su discurso de respuesta, la gimnasta Hong expreso la determinacion de entrenarse con tenacidad sin olvidar ni un momento el amor y la confianza del partido para demostrar el impetu de la Corea del Songun al izar la bandera nacional en los juegos internacionales.

articles.title: Miembros de embajada cubana en Corea realizan trabajo de amistad
articles.content:
Miembros de embajada cubana en Corea realizan trabajo de amistad
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- El embajador German Hermin Ferras Alvarez y otros miembros de la Embajada de la Republica de Cuba en Corea realizaron el dia 15 un trabajo de amistad en la Granja Invernadero de Vegetales de Hwasong de Amistad Corea-Cuba.
					En esa granja donde estan grabadas las huellas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, los huespedes cubanos ayudaron a los granjeros en el transporte de las gavillas de arroz.
					
					En el tiempo de descanso, departieron con los funcionarios de la granja profundizando la amistad.
					
					El embajador cubano deseo que los granjeros produzcan una innovacion en la produccion agricola apoyando la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Independencia es vida de cada pais y nacion, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Independencia es vida de cada pais y nacion, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- Si todos los paises y naciones mantienen la independiente politica exterior tomando la independencia como vida, se estableceran sin falta las relaciones internacionales imparciales y de principios.
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este miercoles y continua:
					
					 Para mantener la independencia, hay que luchar con la posicion independiente y construir una economia nacional autarquica.
					
					 Hoy en dia, los imperialistas intentan la intervencion y la dominacion a traves de la penetracion economica disfrazada de "ayuda" y "cooperacion". Por lo tanto, resulta un problema apremiante lograr la independencia economica.
					
					 Por otra parte, la autodefensa nacional deviene la garantia militar para mantener la independencia politica y lograr la autarquia.
					
					  Si se cuenta con la defensa nacional capaz de enfrentarse con cualquier enemigo fuerte, los imperialistas nunca se atreven a desatar la guerra de agresion.
					
					  Esfumarse ante el fuerte y ponerse mas feroz ante el debil, esto la psicologia y atributo de los imperialistas.
					
					  Lo comprueba la tradicion de victoria que ha logrado la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en la confrontacion total con los imperialistas yanquis.
					
					  Todos los paises aspirantes a la independencia deben unirse para que en la escena internacional, no campeen mas la coaccion y la arbitrariedad de los imperialistas.
					
					  Aunque los imperialistas actuan con desesperacion, no podran bloquear jamas el camino de las amplias masas trabajadoras que luchan por la independencia.
